units.name: Warboss
units.fluff: Da biggest and da baddest Ork in da mob. If any Ork is gonna lead da WAAAGH!, it's da Warboss!

wargearOptions.name: Melee Weapon
wargearOptions.replacementText: Replace Power Klaw with one of the following:

abilities.name: Waaagh! Leader
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

abilities.name: Breakin' Heads
abilities.description: Once per turn, when a friendly ORK unit within 6" of this model fails a Battle-shock test, this model can use this ability. If it does, that test is treated as having been passed.

units.name: Boyz
units.fluff: Da backbone of any Ork warband. Boyz are tough, numerous, and always up for a good scrap!

wargearOptions.name: Main Weapons
wargearOptions.replacementText: All models can replace their Slugga and Choppa with a Shoota:

wargearOptions.name: Nob Upgrade
wargearOptions.replacementText: 1 model (the Nob) can replace their Choppa:

abilities.name: Mob Rule
abilities.description: Each time this unit takes a Battle-shock test, it rolls one additional D6 and discards one of the results.

units.name: Deff Dread
units.fluff: A lumbering mechanical monstrosity, the Deff Dread crushes foes beneath its armoured bulk while its mighty Dread Klaws tear apart tanks and infantry alike.

wargearOptions.name: Weapon Slot 1
wargearOptions.replacementText: Replace one Dread Klaw with one of the following:

wargearOptions.name: Weapon Slot 2
wargearOptions.replacementText: Replace another Dread Klaw with one of the following:

abilities.name: Smoke
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of your Movement phase, this VEHICLE can use its Smoke Launchers. Until the start of your next turn, ranged attacks made against this model have a -1 to their Hit rolls.

abilities.name: Rampage
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a melee attack, if it charged this turn, add 1 to the Attack characteristic.

units.name: Nobz
units.fluff: The biggest, meanest Orks in any warband short of a Warboss. Nobz love krumping just as much as regular Boyz, but they do it much, much harder.

wargearOptions.name: Melee Weapon
wargearOptions.replacementText: All models can replace their Choppa with one of the following:

wargearOptions.name: Waaagh! Banner
wargearOptions.replacementText: 1 model can carry the Waaagh! Banner:

choices.name: Waaagh! Banner
abilities: +1 Attacks to friendly ORK INFANTRY within 6"

abilities.name: 'Eavy Armour
abilities.description: Models in this unit have a 4+ armour save and a 5+ invulnerable save.

detachments.name: War Horde
detachments.description: The most straightforward expression of Ork warfare — an overwhelming mass of boyz charging headlong at the enemy, fuelled by barely-contained aggression.

detachmentRule.name: Waaagh!
detachmentRule.description: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, you can declare a Waaagh!. Until the end of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of models in friendly ORK INFANTRY and ORK MOUNTED units, and those units are not affected by the Battle-shock ability.

enhancements.name: Warlord's Kunnin'
enhancements.description: Once per phase, when a friendly ORK unit within 6" of the bearer makes an attack, you can re-roll one Hit roll for that attack.

enhancements.name: Brutal but Kunnin'
enhancements.description: The bearer can move through and over other models and terrain features as if they were not there, and does not suffer the penalty for Difficult Ground.

enhancements.name: Beast Snagga Spirit
enhancements.description: Add 1 to the Strength characteristic of the bearer. In addition, the bearer's unit has the BEAST SNAGGA keyword.

enhancements.name: Surging Brutality
enhancements.description: Add 1 to Charge rolls made for the bearer's unit.

stratagems.name: More Dakka!
stratagems.target: One ORK INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, on an unmodified Hit roll of 6, that attack scores 1 additional hit.

stratagems.name: Pile In And Krump!
stratagems.when: Your Fight phase, when an ORK unit from your army is selected to fight.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, when models in that unit pile in, they can move up to 6" instead of 3".

stratagems.name: 'Ere We Go!
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase, when an ORK unit from your army declares a charge.

stratagems.name: Bomb Squig
stratagems.target: One ORK unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit within 12" of that unit and not within Engagement Range of it. Roll D6+3 dice: for each roll of 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.name: Unstoppable Green Tide
stratagems.when: Your Morale phase, when an ORK unit from your army takes a Battle-shock test.
stratagems.effect: That unit automatically passes that Battle-shock test.

stratagems.name: Waaagh! Drums
stratagems.when: The start of your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: Up to 3 ORK units from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2" to the Move characteristic of those units.

detachments.name: Kult of Speed
detachments.description: Speed is da best armour — at least dat's what da Speed Freeks say before they go zoom past da enemy and krump 'em from behind.

detachmentRule.name: Full Throttle
detachmentRule.description: SPEED FREEKS units from your army can Advance and still make a Normal move, Advance move, or charge move in the same turn. In addition, each time a SPEED FREEKS model from your army makes an attack, if the model's unit made an Advance move this turn, that attack is not affected by the penalty for Advancing and Shooting.

enhancements.name: Pedal to da Metal
enhancements.description: Add 2" to the Move characteristic of the bearer.

enhancements.name: Deff Skull Lucky Charm
enhancements.description: The bearer has a 5+ invulnerable save.

enhancements.name: Kunnin' but Brutal
enhancements.description: Once per battle, after the bearer's unit has been destroyed, if the bearer's model has not been removed from play, it can fight one more time before it is removed.

enhancements.name: Speedfreak's Rush
enhancements.description: Each time the bearer makes a melee attack, if the bearer's unit charged this turn, add 1 to the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: Turbo Boosta
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, when a SPEED FREEKS unit from your army is selected to move.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, that unit can make an additional Advance move.

stratagems.name: Tank Busta Bombs
stratagems.when: Your Fight phase, when an ORK unit from your army is selected to fight.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack against a VEHICLE unit, add 2 to the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.name: Hit and Run
stratagems.when: Your Fight phase, after a SPEED FREEKS unit from your army has fought.
stratagems.effect: That unit can make a Fall Back move of up to 6". If it does, it can still shoot this turn.

stratagems.name: Da Red Wunz Go Fasta
stratagems.target: One ORK VEHICLE unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Range characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit.

stratagems.name: Flat Out!
stratagems.target: One SPEED FREEKS unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: That unit can consolidate up to 6" instead of 3".

stratagems.name: Ramming Speed
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase, when a SPEED FREEKS VEHICLE unit from your army declares a charge.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, that unit's Charge roll is considered to be 6. In addition, each time that unit makes a melee attack in the subsequent Fight phase, add 1 to the Hit roll.

detachments.name: Green Tide
detachments.description: A wall of green flesh and sharp metal, the Green Tide overwhelms its enemies through sheer numbers, and it seems like no matter how many you shoot down, there's always more of 'em!

detachmentRule.name: Sheer Weight of Numbers
detachmentRule.description: Each time an ORK INFANTRY model from your army makes a melee attack, if that model's unit contains 10 or more models, add 1 to the Hit roll. If that model's unit contains 15 or more models, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

enhancements.name: 'Eavy Armour Plating
enhancements.description: Improve the bearer's Save characteristic by 1 (to a minimum of 3+). In addition, the bearer has a 5+ invulnerable save.

enhancements.name: Proper Killy
enhancements.description: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the bearer.

enhancements.name: Warpaint
enhancements.description: The first time the bearer's unit is destroyed, roll one D6: on a 3+, set that unit back up on the battlefield as if it were the start of the game, with D6+2 models.

enhancements.name: Brutal Strength
enhancements.description: Each time the bearer makes a melee attack, re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: Mob Rule
stratagems.when: Your Morale phase, when a Battle-shock test is taken for an ORK INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Roll one additional D6 and discard the lowest result. If the test is still failed, only D3 models flee instead of D6.

stratagems.name: Ded 'Ard
stratagems.when: Any phase, when an ORK INFANTRY unit from your army is selected as the target of an attack.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit would lose a wound, roll one D6: on a 4+, that wound is not lost.

stratagems.name: Squash It!
stratagems.when: Your Fight phase, when an ORK INFANTRY unit from your army is selected to fight.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack against one enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1 for that attack.

stratagems.name: Crush 'Em!
stratagems.when: Your Fight phase, when an ORK INFANTRY unit from your army is selected to fight.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit.

stratagems.name: Call da Waaagh!
stratagems.when: The start of your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: Up to 3 ORK INFANTRY units from your army.
stratagems.effect: Each of those units can make an Advance move of 6" without rolling the dice.

stratagems.name: Rampage!
stratagems.when: Your Fight phase, when an ORK INFANTRY unit from your army with 20 or more models is selected to fight.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit.
